mapper.select: SELECT num, title, nick, date, inqu, reco FROM board ORDER BY num desc, date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( canum, type, title, nick, password, content, inqu, reco, appro, concept, nonreco, hitnum, repnum )VALUES( #{canum}, #{type}, #{title}, #{nick}, #{password}, #{content}, #{inqu}, #{reco}, #{appro}, #{concept}, #{nonreco}, #{hitnum}, #{repnum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET inqu = inqu+1 WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE board SET nick=#{nick}, password=#{password}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, WHERE num = #{num}
